name: B Boy Surfers: New Train Running
name_original: B Boy Surfers: New Train Running
description:
B Boy Surfers : New Train Running is the story of B-Boy, This subway the most amazing & the craziest surfer game is here!
When children misbehave so fun to spraying. Police is chasing ran out to bring back. Children need to play to run on the train tracks as soon as possible.
Surfing, running, dashing as you like. Railing along the exciting temple and subway scenes with different objects.

- Have a training session for the first time play. Swipe up, down, left and right to control and the surfing. Tap to shoot.
- Collect the coins as many as you can. Use them for upgrading.
- The game will stop after clash. You can choose to resume or play the game from start

How to play game :
- Tap and drag up to jump.
- Tap and drag down to roll.
- MAGNETS can help you collect more coins.
- Tap and drag left and right to move left and right.
- Collect the coins as many as you can. Use them for upgrading.
- The game will stop after clash. ( You can choose to resume or play the game from start )
- Have a training session for the first time play. Swipe up, down, left and right to control and the surfing.

You rush, jump, slide through the 3D castle without clash to gain more and more coins to buy many items and shoot the rivals. Have fun with this endless game with endless fun.
B Boy Surfers : New Train Running is a addictive fun game. Download it now and start your journey!!
